subtitles:
184326 186995 - Oh, God...
- Keep your shit together.
187079 190165 If you wanna get 'em out of here.

190999 193669 - I can pop these, no problem.
- So get to it!
207891 210394 Security, we have a break-in. Get the...

218861 221697 I know who you are.
I know what you think...

221780 225617 If you don't wanna get hurt,
keep your mouth shut and don't move.

225701 230956 The chimps are infected. They're highly
contagious. They've been given an inhibitor.

231040 234501 - Infected with what?
- To cure, you must first understand.

243093 246263 - What is he talking about?
- Get the cages open.

248390 252686 Listen, you sick bastard,
we're taking your torture victims with us.
252770 254355 We'll get you out of here.

254438 259109 The animals are contagious. The infection
is in their blood and saliva. One bite...
276460 278587 Get it off! Get it off!

282216 285427 - What's the matter with her?
- You have to kill her!

294103 297314 - What's the matter with her?
- We have to kill her now!

1002978 1005856 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just shut up!

1013989 1016575 - Covered everything.
- Who are those people?

1045229 1047481 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just move!

1077469 1082224 Man walks into a bar with a giraffe.
They each get pissed.

1084393 1089606 The man goes to leave and the barman says
"Oi! You can't leave that lying there."
1089690 1093736 He says "No, it's not a lion. It's a giraffe".
1104329 1107249 You two should get on like a house on fire.

1114048 1117551 - Are you a doctor?
- He's not a doctor. He's a patient.

1122139 1128562 I was riding a package from Farringdon to
Shaftesbury Avenue and a car cut across me.

1128645 1132399 Then I wake up today in hospital.
I wake up and I'm...

1157966 1164223 It started as rioting, and right from
the beginning you knew this was different.

1164306 1168477 Because it was happening
in small villages, market towns.
1169353 1172106 And then it wasn't on the TV any more.

1172189 1176902 It was in the street outside.
It was coming through your windows.
1180781 1183617 You didn't need a doctor to tell you that.
1186245 1188747 There was something in the blood.

1190207 1195170 By the time they tried to evacuate
the cities, it was already too late.
1202302 1205013 And that's when the exodus started.

1209226 1212896 there were reports of Infection
in Paris and New York.
1215274 1218193 We didn't hear anything more after that.

1221155 1224116 - What's the government doing?
- There's no government.

1226744 1230831 There's always a government.
They're in a bunker or a plane...

1230914 1235210 No, there's no government,
no police, no army.
1236670 1239757 No TV, no radio, no electricity.

1240382 1244553 You're the first uninfected person
we've seen in six days.

1262946 1266950 Look, I have to find them.
They live in Deptford. I can walk it. OK?
1267034 1269620 You'll go and come back, yeah?

1284385 1288806 You never go anywhere alone
unless you've got no choice.

1291308 1295396 Only travel during daylight.
Unless you've got no choice.

1299566 1303153 We'll all go and find
your dead parents together, OK?

1317835 1321004 If you want her to slow down,
you'll have to say.

1485377 1489339 They died peacefully.
You should be grateful.

1495804 1500309 parents and my sister,
we went to Paddington Station,

1502936 1508275 hoping maybe we could get on a plane,
maybe we could buy our way onto a plane.
1508901 1511278 I remember my dad had all this cash,
1511362 1514698 even though cash was completely useless.
1516241 1519370 About 20,000 other people had the same idea.
1524917 1527252 I lost my grip on my sister's hand.
1529421 1531757 I remember the ground was soft.

1533717 1538097 I looked down
and I was standing on all these people.
1538180 1542142 Like a carpet. People who had fallen and...

1542226 1546188 Somewhere in the crowd
there were infected. It spread fast.

1546271 1549608 No one could run.
All you could do was climb.

1551235 1554321 Climb over more people.
So I did that. I climbed.
1554405 1556782 And I got up on top of this kiosk.

1559076 1564039 Looking down, you couldn't tell
which faces were infected and which weren't.

1564123 1568001 Then I saw my dad.
Not my mum or my sister.

1582099 1587271 We don't have time to get back to the shop
before dark. We should stay here tonight.

1589940 1592776 My room's up at the top.
You two can have that.

1592860 1596196 No, we'll all sleep in the same room.
It's safer.
1698882 1701176 Give me a drink of that, will ya?

1745596 1748557 - That's Mr Bridges.
- Were you bitten?
1748640 1750851 And his daughter. From four doors down.
1754104 1757024 Did any of the blood get in your mouth?
1794895 1796980 Do you have any clothes here?

1800067 1803737 Then get them and get dressed.
We have to leave now.

1803821 1807491 More infected will be coming.
They always do.

1836270 1839273 How did you know?
How did you know he was infected?

1839356 1843277 - The blood.
- There was blood on me. It was on you.

1843360 1848741 I didn't know he was infected.
He knew. I could see it in his face.

1848824 1853245 If someone gets infected,
you've about 20 seconds to kill them.

1853328 1858459 It might be your brother, your sister
or your oldest friend. It makes no difference.

1858542 1863964 Just so you know where you stand,
if it happens to you, I'll do it in a heartbeat.

1864048 1868260 He was full of plans.
Have you got any plans, Jim?

1868343 1872806 Do you want us to find a cure and
save the world or just fall in love and fuck?
1875476 1878062 Staying alive's as good as it gets.

1936787 1939915 What is it about tower blocks
and shopping trolleys?
1939998 1943085 Stop talking. It's a long way up.
1961020 1963105 Now I do need a break.

1982875 1988172 - Why didn't you say something before?
- I didn't think you'd give a shit.

1989381 1993635 You've got no fat on you
and all you've had to eat is sugar.
1995929 1998182 There isn't a lot we can do about that

1998265 2003354 except pump you full of painkillers
and give you more sugar. As for sugar,

2009068 2012112 Actually,
I did have a can of Tango somewhere.

2089481 2092484 - Open the fucking door!
- Where's Dad?
2092568 2094862 Let them in, Hannah. Let them inside.

2128270 2131357 - Selena.
- Selena. Good to meet you.
2146622 2148916 Calls for a celebration, I'd say.
2148999 2152044 Why don't you all sit down and...
2152127 2155089 Hannah, what have we got to offer?
2155172 2157674 We've got Mum's cr�me de menthe.

2168644 2171647 - Where are the bloody glasses?
- Middle cupboard.
2171730 2174608 Nah, the good ones. It's a celebration.
2197381 2200467 I know it isn't much but, well, cheers.

2229288 2234877 Sorry we couldn't spare the water.
Same with the toilet. The flush doesn't work.
2236545 2238797 You'll have to use the bucket.
2245345 2247973 Have to empty it each morning.

2248057 2251727 Just chuck it over the balcony.
No mod cons here.
2253604 2256732 Listen, it's late. We're gonna turn in.
2270079 2272456 I'll take the living room. It's fine.

2309159 2312871 - So what do you make of them?
- Well, they're desperate.
2313997 2316834 Probably need us more than we need them.

2328137 2332808 You should be more concerned about
whether they're gonna slow you down.

2332891 2336645 - Because if they slowed you down...
- I'd leave them behind.

2341108 2344653 Then you're gonna wind up
getting yourself killed.
2360711 2363964 You think I don't get it, but I do get it.

2365841 2369845 And I know I'd be dead already
if I hadn't met you.
2402044 2404129 We lost water pressure three weeks ago.

2404213 2408342 I thought we'd be OK with the water
from the other flats. Cisterns and tanks.

2408425 2411637 But it vanishes so quick
you wouldn't believe.

2428112 2432366 You can set up a plastic sheet
to catch dew and condensation.

2432449 2436203 Saw it on TV once,
but I can't make it work.

2452261 2455389 Jim, we're not going to be able
to stay here.

2464314 2468068 - There's been no broadcasts for weeks.
- Just listen.

2468152 2472740 Salvation is here.
The answer to Infection is here.
2472823 2475826 If you can hear this, you're not alone.

2475909 2480414 There are others like you.
There are other survivors.
2480497 2482708 We are soldiers and we are armed.

2486170 2490758 - Quiet. There's more.
- Our location is the 42nd blockade, M602,

2494344 2498265 - You must find us. Salvation is...
- Now it just repeats.

2498348 2500726 - It's a recording?
- Yeah, it's a recording.
2500809 2503729 But this is where it's telling us to go.

2507483 2512279 The way things are, we might need
two or three days to get up there.

2518160 2524249 Sound carries in this flat. Me and Hannah
do need you more than you need us.

2524333 2527503 - Look, I didn't...
- No, it's OK. It's the truth.

2527586 2530089 I can't leave the block
if it's the two of us.

2530172 2534134 Something might happen to me.
Hannah'd be alone. I couldn't risk it.

2536011 2540307 If it's a recording,
the soldiers who made it could be dead.

2540391 2543894 - It's possible.
- That stuff about the answer to Infection...

2543977 2548273 There is no answer!
It's already done all the damage it can!

2548357 2551193 - Maybe they have a cure.
- Maybe they've got nothing.

2551276 2555364 - The only way to find out is to reach them.
- We could die trying, Frank!

2559827 2565541 And anyway, it isn't true what Dad said.
You need us just the same as we need you.

2569002 2574299 And we'll never be safe in the cities.
The soldiers could keep us safe.
2575008 2577094 So we have to try and get there.

2591233 2594987 Just so you know,
I don't take cheques or credit cards.

2623557 2626560 - What do you think?
- It's the most direct route.

2626643 2631899 Then we should take the indirect route.
The one in daylight and not underground.
2649500 2652002 No. See, this is a really shit idea.

2652878 2656256 You know why?
Because it's obviously a shit idea.

2656340 2660719 So we're gonna drive into the tunnel
full of fucking smashed cars...
2660803 2663722 It's really fucking obviously a shit idea!
2699383 2701802 The world's worst place to get a flat.
2701885 2705222 Agreed. I think we'd better do this quick.
2707725 2709893 I've got the wheel. You're on the jack.

2724491 2728037 Do you hear that?
Hey, hey, do you hear that?

2760027 2764323 Forget the jack, Hannah.
There's no time. Just lift, everyone.
2764406 2767659 Grab hold! One, two, three, lift!

2774124 2779254 - Don't look at them! Don't look!
- I can see them! They're coming!

2790140 2793060 - Get the tyre on, Hannah!
- I'm trying.

2806448 2808909 - Get in the car!
- Come on!

2885402 2888989 Don't take anything
that needs to be cooked, OK?
2889073 2890908 I think you can eat that raw.

2898582 2903087 If I never see another chocolate bar again,
it'll be too soon.

2907800 2911428 Now, single malt,
16-year-old, dark, full flavour.

2919520 2922773 Takes out the fire
but leaves in the warmth.
2977661 2980748 Either we do this now or we're walking.

3032966 3035636 Like going on holidays
with your aunt!

3133776 3136570 - Find anything, Jim?
- No! Let's get outta here.
3212521 3215524 I can, like, taste the vitamin C.
3216358 3219153 Mmmm, the raisins are so moist.

3280464 3284176 That you'll never hear
another piece of original music again.

3284259 3288430 You'll never read a book
that hasn't already been written,
3289473 3293310 or see a film that hasn't already been shot.
3297815 3301068 Um.... that's what you were thinking.
3304279 3306573 I was thinking I was wrong.

3318001 3322506 It doesn't really mean anything
to Frank and Hannah because...

3323882 3327344 Well, she's got her dad
and he's got his daughter. So...

3330013 3333642 I was wrong when I said
staying alive is as good as it gets.
3337271 3339773 See, that's what I was thinking.

3357541 3361545 It's getting late.
We'd better stay here for the night.
3389865 3392534 Selena didn't seem to have any trouble.

3409343 3413222 Bloody hell. Must've needed
a hell of a prescription for that lot.

3413305 3417601 I didn't need a prescription.
I qualified as a chemist.
3420312 3422898 Not only will we be able to get to sleep

3422981 3426694 but if we're attacked in the middle
of the night, we won't even care.

3426777 3429029 - Two each.
- Not for me, thanks.
3441500 3444211 Come on, Frank. Let her live a little.

3445295 3449299 - Give her half of one.
- All right. We're on.
3526210 3529004 You're having a bad dream, that's all.

3584309 3587813 - Did I miss breakfast?
- You'll sleep through anything.

3587896 3592901 - Did you have a fry-up?
- We'll stop at a pub on the way. Door!
3668811 3672189 The whole of Manchester, the whole city.
3674024 3676360 No fire crews to put it out.

3807324 3811328 I don't understand, Dad.
Did they leave?

3811412 3814540 - I don't like this. I think we should go.
- No!

3821380 3826218 Vehicles. We should check the vehicles.
There has to be something.

3942626 3945546 - Dad?
- Keep away from me! Keep away from me!
3945629 3948132 Keep away! Keep away! Keep away!

4082266 4087146 Well, we've got beds with clean sheets
and a boiler that produces hot water.
4087229 4089648 So you can all have a shower.
4089732 4093068 You look like you need one. Please.

4113005 4118218 It ain't funny. I got loads of
cooking to do, you fucking Doris!

4127019 4130189 She's lost her dad, Jim.
That's how she is.

4142493 4146080 Oh, don't do that.
Come on, come on, come on.

4149917 4154922 Hannah is what Frank says she is. Tough,
strong, and she'll cope just like I'll cope.

4155005 4158926 - Just like you'll cope.
- I don't want her to have to fucking cope.
4160219 4162638 I want her to be OK.
4164223 4166392 When Hannah had her dad it was OK.
4166475 4169269 It was OK for them and it was OK for us.

4209393 4212896 - Yeah, we did.
- We must be a disappointment.

4212980 4219111 You were hoping for a full brigade. An army
base with helicopters and a field hospital.

4221530 4225701 - We were just hoping for...
- The answer to Infection.

4230205 4234710 As I said before, it's here. Though
it may not be quite what you imagined.

4235085 4238005 - Just feel lucky to have found you.
- You were lucky.

4238088 4241216 The fire drove hundreds of infected
out of Manchester.
4241300 4244386 The surrounding area's teeming with them.

4254438 4260319 Flat terrain all round the house. Floodlights
which we've rigged up to a generator.

4264031 4268285 And we've been lacing the ground
with tripwires and land mines.

4268369 4273040 You wouldn't want to mow the lawn,
but if they get in, we hear them.

4276293 4281215 Secondary to protection,
our real job is to rebuild. Start again.
4281298 4283717 The belly of the house. The heart.

4283801 4289056 A wood-fired boiler providing us with hot
water. The first step towards civilisation.
4291308 4293435 Here you are. I'll swap you.

4293519 4296730 - Now don't be throwing it.
- Here, give us some.

4296814 4300859 Don't be fighting.
Will you put that back? Put it back.

4303404 4306407 - What are you cooking, Jones?
- Surprise, sir.

4330806 4335894 Mitchell managed to knock him out cold
and we got a chain round his neck.

4343569 4347614 The idea was to learn something
about Infection.
4370304 4373724 He's telling me he'll never bake bread.

4385361 4390741 And eventually he'll tell me how long
the infected take to starve to death.
4430489 4432950 � You'll have to wait and see
4435369 4437955 � We hope it's chips, it's chips
4454346 4457725 Tinned ham, tinned peas, tinned beans and...

4465315 4467776 - It's a feast, Jones.
- Honour of our guests.
4467860 4471071 Absolutely. I was going to propose a toast
4471155 4474283 but this omelette will do just as well.

4489840 4493761 Jones, did you notice while cooking
that these eggs were off?

4493844 4497264 I thought the salt
might cover the taste, sir.
4504229 4507024 I don't suppose you can cook, can you?

4507858 4513322 I can't tell you how badly we need
someone with a little flair in the kitchen.

4513405 4517951 What a fucking disappointment.
I saw those eggs, I thought it was Christmas.

4518035 4521288 We'll have eggs again.
Once everything's back to normal.
4521372 4524208 You muppet! Look at him, eh?

4524291 4528337 He's still waiting
for Marks and Spencer's to reopen.

4528420 4532758 - You don't know nothing.
- I think Bill's got a point.
4532841 4535969 If you look at the whole life of the planet,

4538055 4542184 you know, Man has only been around
for a few blinks of an eye.
4542935 4545396 So if the infection wipes us all out,
4546397 4548691 that is a return to normality.

4552695 4555698 - That what you meant, Bill?
- Yeah, yeah.
4555781 4559034 Have you met our New Age sergeant?

4561912 4567126 Tell me, Farrell, exactly why
did you join the army in the first place?

4569920 4574049 This is what I've seen
in the four weeks since Infection.

4576844 4581390 Which is what I saw in the four weeks before
Infection, the four weeks before that...

4581473 4586937 As far back as I care to remember,
people killing people.

4587021 4590649 Which to my mind
puts us in a state of normality now.

4598949 4601910 - You're not eating?
- I don't want to eat.

4604872 4608125 I don't want to eat.
I want to bury my dad.
4609043 4612171 He's one of the people you're talking about.
4616258 4618302 Let's go, let's go, let's go!

4670104 4673732 What do you want, a fucking sweetie?
Keep shooting, you cunt!
4690416 4692710 I ain't never seen that in my life!

4715357 4720988 Listen, sweetheart, you ain't
gonna be needing this any more.
4721071 4723282 Cos you got me to protect you now.

4725075 4730372 You wanna get your hands on a really
big chopper, you just come and see me.

4731999 4734168 - That's an offer, Mitch.
- Give her some.

4740382 4744887 Easy, tiger. You don't wanna go
picking a fight with me, son.

4752603 4755647 - Mitchell, first action on.
- Resecure the perimeter.
4755731 4759193 Then get to it. Jones, Bedford, go with him.
4769661 4772373 Clear the bodies off the lawn.
4775250 4777836 The rest of you, go with him.

4800234 4804446 We're very grateful for your protection
but if we're gonna stay here...

4804530 4806073 - Who have you killed?
- No one.

4806156 4811328 Who have you killed? You wouldn't be alive
now if you hadn't killed somebody.
4818585 4821714 I killed... I killed a boy.

4833350 4838147 But you had to.
Otherwise he'd have killed you.

4859126 4862921 Eight days ago I found Jones
with his gun in his mouth.

4864089 4868802 He said he was going to kill himself
because there was no future.
4868886 4871764 What could I say to him?

4871847 4877061 We fight off the infected or we wait
until they starve to death and then what?

4877978 4881815 What do nine men do
except wait to die themselves?

4881899 4888030 I moved us from the blockade, I set the radio
broadcasting and I promised them women.

4905589 4907383 - What is it?
- We have to go.

4907466 4909551 - Jim, wait!
- No time! Come on!
4915682 4917643 We get in the car and we go!

4919019 4923565 No! You're not going to keep them here!
You've got to let them go!

4923649 4926902 You can't keep them here!
Stay where you are!
4926985 4929697 I'm not gonna let you keep them here!
4943627 4945963 I want to give you a chance.
4949800 4952094 But I can't let them go.

4980164 4982916 Smithers says
"Women and semen don't mix."

4983000 4985919 And Mr Burns says
"We all know what you think, Smithers."

4986003 4988922 And that was my favourite joke
in The Simpsons.

4989006 4992634 That's what they're doing a few
hundred miles away, across the Channel,

4992718 4997139 across the Atlantic. Eating dinner
and watching the fucking Simpsons!

4997222 5000517 They're sleeping in their beds
next to their wives.

5000601 5006315 But we're here chained to a fucking radiator
because the OC has gone insane!

5007358 5011403 Starting the world again when the rest
of the world hasn't even stopped.
5012780 5015908 Just imagine, just think about it.
5016950 5019244 How could Infection cross the oceans?

5019328 5023624 How could it cross the mountains
and the rivers? It can be stopped.

5023707 5026418 Right now TVs are playing
and planes are flying

5026502 5030506 and the rest of the world
is continuing as fucking normal.

5034802 5038389 What would you do
with a diseased little island?

5047147 5051527 "There is no Infection.
It's just people killing people." He's insane!

5098073 5101201 - Please...
- Believe me, I'm not interested.

5102286 5107416 You see, I'm gonna have the black one.
And I'm gonna make her squirm.

5107499 5111420 Mitchell, I swear to God
it's gonna end badly for you.
5115257 5117342 Get up, you cunt! Fucking move!

5142326 5145746 Come on then, you fucking pansies.
Do me first.
5145829 5148332 No, Mitch. Mitch, just use the gat.

5148415 5151460 - So you're gonna stick me?
- Shoot 'em!

5154296 5157341 Is that how you'd let
your sergeant go out, Jones?

5157424 5159343 - I'll shoot them!
- No, you won't.

5159426 5162888 You'll let him stick me?
Like a fucking dog?

5172189 5176151 You stupid cunt! What are you doing?
You wanna shoot me?

5176235 5180406 - You wanna shoot me? I'll kill you!
- Where's he fucking gone?
5181657 5184493 Fuck it! Get up! Get after him!

5186995 5190207 - Jones, move it!
- I can see him! I can see him!

5199967 5201885 - Can you see him?
- Through there!
5217359 5220821 He's over the wall. He's got no vehicle.

5259860 5263822 The first thing we're going to do
is make you look more presentable.

5263906 5267493 The lady of the house
has an extensive wardrobe
5267576 5270120 which she certainly has no use for.
5271121 5272956 You can't do it to Hannah.

5273040 5276752 Go to the master bedroom,
pick out a wide selection.

5290265 5293060 - It's only dressing up!
- No! Selena!

5293143 5296480 - I thought girls liked dressing up.
- Expensive dresses.

5315249 5319378 You need to leave me alone
with Hannah. OK?

5321255 5324967 - Listen, right. The OC wants...
- He wants us to dress up nice.

5325050 5329221 If you want us to get changed,
you have to leave the room. OK?
5352995 5355873 Come on, lads. Let's leave the room.

5378937 5382900 We're gonna eat these, Hannah, OK?
Come on. Eat these.
5382983 5385152 Are you trying to kill me?
5387571 5390115 I'm making you not care. OK?
5402086 5404755 Stay here and put the dresses on.

5410594 5413180 He went over the wall.
We thought he'd be dead.
5643243 5645704 It sounded like a Claymore to me.

5646747 5650709 All right, I'll go and hit the floods,
take a butcher's.
5653462 5656090 keep an eye on him, will ya?
5669269 5671772 I think they're having an effect.

5687329 5690207 What are you gonna do
if they don't come back?
5690958 5694044 Would you be the officer if Henry was dead?
5694128 5696130 Is that the way it works?

5699675 5703762 I don't think they are coming back.
I think they've been killed.

5722698 5725826 We're gonna get out of here.
Stay with it, Hannah.
5725909 5728746 Don't worry. I feel fine. Really.

5750809 5756357 Oi! Where the fuck are you going?
What's all the fucking shouting about?

5764323 5767701 Don't just stand there,
you soppy cunt! Get after them!
5790140 5793102 What the fuck you gonna do now?

5819670 5823424 - Defend these stairs with your fucking life!
- Hannah!

6002144 6006523 I haven't got any bullets.
I haven't got any fucking bullets!

6069920 6074717 It's just you and me now, darlin'.
But don't worry, I'll get you out of here.

6074800 6079263 Then we'll find a nice little fucking place
somewhere. Just you and me.
6079346 6081682 And we'll live happy ever after, eh?
6146038 6148540 That was longer than a heartbeat.
6162805 6166350 Listen. Listen. It's not all fucked.
6172106 6174608 We're gonna be OK. It's not all fucked.

6174692 6178028 - I've got to explain something.
- Shut up.
6186537 6190124 Hannah, it's OK! He's not infected.
6190207 6192292 But I thought he was biting you.
6192376 6195045 I was kissing her. Are you stoned?
6197381 6199508 We have to get out of here. Come on!
6393952 6396622 You looked all right in this, you know.

6418268 6421605 - I can't hear anything!
- I told you, I heard it!
6477077 6479997 Do you think he saw us this time?

6484300 6490000 Visiontext subtitles: Susan Voas
ENGLISH from SDH � 30.09.2021
